long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenloop will record, transcribe, provide real-time and post interview data/analytics and also coach your team to ‘Make Every Interview Count.’ Our platform will ensure your interviews are fair, free of bias and most of all a great experience for both you and the candidate.

With Screenloop, just join the video conferencing (Zoom, Google Meet) interview, focus on the candidate and let us do our thing. Once the interview is over, our platform will help you make the right decision every time.
